Label: Narrative
Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is SWITZERLAND 1. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 01 CH1. VC present in all Swiss alps, several labels in place (organic, 'from alps', national park labels etc.), very traditional, part of Swiss identity.   The reference mountain chain of this VC is Swiss Alps. The reference mountain landscape of this VC is Canton of Grisons. Grisons is the only tri-lingual canton of Switzerland and economically, culturally and politically very diverse. It is the only place where the Romansh language is spoken. Grisons has more than 900 mountain peaks and 150 valleys, it has typical mountain area and highland landscapes. 41% of the people here live above 1000 masl. The majority is employed in the service sector, tourism is a pillar of the canton's economy. Agriculturally, the farmers cultivate land stretching across the entire Alpine arc, from the grapes and chestnuts in the south to the highest alps and steep slopes down to the Rhine Walley, where all crops grow.   The size of the area (km2) is 7105. The minimum altimetry of the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is 253. The maximum altimetry of the LAU is 4048. The total population (in thousand) is 199. Overall the type of challenge faced by this VC is Current and Predicted. This VC is classified as Traditional.   The type of innovation of this VC (Value Chain) is unspecified. The innovation is related to the whole VC. The land use systems involved are Grassland. The local assets include Natural, social and cultural.   The VC is present in all of the Swiss Alps, the MRL mentioned below was chosen because it corresponds most to the area we are working in.
